2. Number 1: Jennifer Heidt

Number 1: Jennifer Heidt
========================

Jennifer Keller Heidt was elected to serve on City Council on May 9, 2015 in Position 1 for a three-year term. Heidt was reelected in May 2018, May 2021, and May 2024.

Councilwoman Heidt has resided in Webster for a little more than 11 years. She is a stay-at-home mom who has raised two sons, T J and Mathew, with her husband of 34 years, Tom. Her hobbies include being involved in her sons' activities and starting each day at the gym.

Councilwoman Heidt's goals include working for a balance between new expansion within Webster and maintaining the integrity of our current infrastructure.



![RFP_4055_pp](https://www.cityofwebster.com/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=10578)

Jennifer Heidt

Term Expires: May 2027
